<result>All files are complete. Let me create a summary of what was implemented.

## Changes Made

- `/Users/sean/Documents/Kyndof/tools/nubabel/src/orchestrator/types/unified-skill.ts`: Created new file with unified skill interface supporting both OMC and Nubabel skill sources. Includes `UnifiedSkill`, `SkillSource`, `SkillCostTier`, `ParsedOmcSkill`, `OmcSkillMetadata`, `SkillMatchResult`, `SkillRoutingDecision`, and registry configuration types.

- `/Users/sean/Documents/Kyndof/tools/nubabel/src/utils/omc-skill-parser.ts`: Created new file with OMC SKILL.md parsing utilities. Includes `parseFrontmatter()`, `extractKeywords()`, `extractAgents()`, `parseSkillMd()`, `convertToUnifiedSkill()`, and `loadOmcSkillsFromDirectory()` functions.

- `/Users/sean/Documents/Kyndof/tools/nubabel/src/orchestrator/unified-skill-registry.ts`: Created singleton registry class managing skills from both sources. Includes `loadSkills()`, `getSkillByName()`, `findSkillByKeywords()`, `registerOmcSkill()`, `registerNubabelSkill()`, caching with TTL, and automatic version detection for OMC skills.

- `/Users/sean/Documents/Kyndof/tools/nubabel/config/skills/omc-skills.json`: Created JSON config with metadata for 10 key OMC skills (autopilot, ralph, ultrawork, plan, analyze, deepsearch, code-review, tdd, security-review, research) including keywords, agents, cost tiers, and conflict definitions.

- `/Users/sean/Documents/Kyndof/tools/nubabel/src/orchestrator/skill-selector.ts:1-4`: Added imports for unified skill registry and types.

- `/Users/sean/Documents/Kyndof/tools/nubabel/src/orchestrator/skill-selector.ts:19-36`: Added `OmcSkillMatch` and `ExtendedSkillSelection` interfaces.

- `/Users/sean/Documents/Kyndof/tools/nubabel/src/orchestrator/skill-selector.ts:248-538`: Added OMC skill routing functions: `findOmcSkill()`, `findAllOmcSkills()`, `resolveSkillConflicts()`, `selectSkillsWithOmc()`, `getOmcSkillByName()`, `detectOmcExecutionMode()`, and `initializeOmcSkillRegistry()`.

## Verification

- Build: TypeScript compilation passes for all new files (verified with `tsc --noEmit`)
- Imports: All cross-file imports are correct and resolve properly
- Dependencies: No external dependencies added

## Summary

Implemented Phase 2 - Skill Integration with a Unified Skill Registry that bridges OMC (oh-my-claudecode) skills with Nubabel's existing skill system. The registry supports automatic loading from OMC's filesystem cache, keyword-based skill routing, priority-based conflict resolution between execution modes, and hybrid skill merging when the same skill exists in both systems.</result>
</task-notification>
